name: GAON GATHANA SAMITI
briefDescription: GGS is a state level non government organisation working for downtrodden people of the rural area of Odisha.We promote SHG to empower women and create aware awareness about financial  inclusion and literacy by wall painting stickers in Bus and auto .We are working for environment issues like pollution ,global warming .We promote Farmers club in agricultural belt to facilitate them through Government Scheme for farmers.GGS also work for child labour issues .
